document.full_text: japanese nuclear power plant operator tepco expects to stop pumping radioactive water into the ocean on monday, days later than planned, a step that would help ease international concern about the spread of radiation from a smashed nuclear plant.
document.title: japan fails to stop radioactive discharge into ocean
lines_and_colors: japanese nuclear power plant operator tepco expects to stop pumping radioactive water into the ocean on monday, days later than planned, a step that would help ease international concern about the spread of radiation from a smashed nuclear plant.
